author: Ted Byrne
content: Ooops, she did it again... became a break-into-TV-shows... A News Alert! But what's always unsettling to me is that our village coots are noticed beyond the town limits. It's weird to realize that our peculiar fixation with human debris... in fact our ability to manufacture it... is humiliatingly a topic of our neighbor's gossip. It makes me want to apologize, not for Britnny (sp.) or Anna Nicole, but that we have a culture that excretes them. AAARGH!
